title: Will The Listed Sanitiser Stocks Clean Up - Or Clean Out - Investors? – ShareCafe
content: The compact is with Holista Colltech ( ( HCT) ) , which will provide the plant-based active ingredient called Path-Away Invisi Shield’s other COVID-19 busting ingredients include olive leaf, echinacea, manuka honey, Kakadu plum, papaya and thyme. Invisi Shield’s plant based formulation does not require TGA approval, while Path-Away is 99.
